tool_description: Identifies and analyzes mixed-use development patterns, quantifying the combination of different land uses within parcels or areas.

land_use_classifications.description: Primary land use classification for each parcel

parcel_areas.description: Area of each parcel in acres

analysis_scale.description: Scale of mixed-use analysis: parcel, block, neighborhood

minimum_mix_threshold.description: Minimum percentage of secondary use to qualify as mixed-use (1-49)

error_messages: Data length mismatch: land_use_classifications and parcel_areas must have the same length.
Invalid analysis scale: Use one of [parcel, block, neighborhood].
Invalid mix threshold: minimum_mix_threshold must be between 1 and 49.
Insufficient data: At least 2 parcels required for mixed-use analysis.
Invalid parcel areas: All area values must be positive numbers.
usage: Provide land_use_classifications and parcel_areas for analysis. Include secondary_uses if available. Set analysis_scale and minimum_mix_threshold to define mixed-use criteria.

mixed_use_count.description: Number of parcels or areas identified as mixed-use

mixed_use_percentage.description: Percentage of analyzed area that is mixed-use

common_combinations.description: Most common land use combinations found

diversity_index.description: Land use diversity score (0-1, higher = more diverse)
